thread.title: The Controversies of NFL Wild-Card Weekend

author: Andrew Beaton
title: The Controversies of NFL Wild-Card Weekend
text:
The NFL’s wild-card weekend produced three nail-biters, two upsets—and a couple of controversies for the league to address.
In the aftermath of Sunday’s games, the league has opened two investigations. It is looking into whether concussion protocol was followed properly with Panthers quarterback Cam Newton, and allegations of racist comments made by Bills offensive lineman Richie Incognito.
Attention...
